sec.p: EBPAS is a well-established 15-item scale to measure practitionersâ€™ attitudes toward making use of evidence-based practices [ 45]. A five-point Likert scale is used to assess degree of agreement with a given statement (0 = not at all to 4 = to a very great extent). Higher mean scores indicate more favorable attitudes. The EBPAS has adequate internal consistency, and construct and content validity.
